histore.document.external module¶

Abstract class for external documents that maintain data in a file on the local file system.

class histore.document.external.ExternalDocument(columns: List[Union[str, histore.document.schema.Column]], filename: str, delete_on_close: bool)¶

Bases: histore.document.base.Document

External document that maintains data in a file in disk.

close()¶

Delete the file if the delete_on_close Flag is True.

read_df() → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame¶

Create data frame from the document rows.

Returns

Return type

pd.DataFrame
